root.name: Dizzy: Prince of the Yolkfolk
root.description: OverviewDizzy: Prince of the Yolkfolk is an adventure game that was developed by Big Red Software for the Nintendo Entertainment System, DOS, Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum, Amiga and the Amstrad CPC. It was the sixth game in the Dizzy series.StoryRockwart the Troll has cast a spell on Daisy that will leave her asleep for 100 years.Â As Dizzy you must set off and stop Rockwart.
